data.name: Golf Gang Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Join the official soundtrack Gang! Tracks available in both MP3 and high-definition WAV files. Music composed by [Syntax Error Music].
data.about_the_game: Join the official soundtrack Gang! Tracks available in both MP3 and high-definition WAV files. Music composed by [Syntax Error Music].
data.short_description: Golf Gang is a racing game. It’s a party game. It’s the fastest game of minigolf you'll ever play! Blend precision with speed to dominate in 8-player online mayhem or your solo speed runs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 500 MB available space

data.legal_notice: Golf Gang © 2022 Lazy Monday Games. All rights reserved. Developed by Lazy Monday Games. Published by Curve Games. “Curve Games” is a trademark of Curve Digital Publishing Limited.
